Easy.Q: Two monkeys found 12 bananas hanging on a tree. How many bananas does each get if they split them equally?
Three young monkeys gathered 15 bananas from the ground. How many bananas per monkey?
Four curious monkeys stumbled upon a bundle of 20 bananas. What’s the share for each monkey?
Six monkeys grabbed a total of 18 bananas. How many bananas does each monkey get?
A group of five monkeys worked together to collect 25 bananas. How many bananas does each monkey take?
Two cheeky monkeys took 8 bananas from the stash. How many bananas does each monkey enjoy?
Three playful monkeys discovered 9 bananas near the river. How many bananas will each monkey receive?
Four monkeys shared 16 bananas after a long day. How many bananas per monkey?
Ten bananas were divided between two monkeys. How many bananas did each monkey get?
A group of six monkeys had 24 bananas to share. How many bananas did each monkey take?

Medium.Q: Five forest monkeys spotted 40 bananas on a tall tree. What’s the share per monkey if they split evenly?
Seven monkeys found a total of 49 bananas. How many bananas does each monkey take home?
Four monkeys worked together to gather 28 bananas. How many bananas does each monkey receive?
Nine monkeys picked 54 bananas from a grove. How many bananas per monkey?
Eight monkeys grabbed 64 bananas during their adventure. How many bananas will each get?
Ten monkeys shared 90 bananas they found by the lake. How many bananas does each one enjoy?
Seven noisy monkeys collected 56 bananas. How many bananas for each one?
Six tired monkeys ended up with 48 bananas after their search. How many bananas for each monkey?
Four monkeys happily shared 36 bananas among themselves. How many bananas per monkey?
A group of eight monkeys feasted on 72 bananas. What’s the fair share for each monkey?

Hard.Q: Twelve monkeys divided a stash of 144 bananas evenly. How many bananas for each monkey?
Fifteen monkeys came across 180 bananas during their safari. How many bananas per monkey?
Twenty jungle monkeys shared 240 bananas they discovered. How many bananas does each one get?
Sixteen monkeys collected 192 bananas. What’s the share per monkey?
Ten monkeys found a pile of 150 bananas near a cave. How many bananas does each monkey grab?
Eight monkeys found 200 bananas hidden in the bushes. How many bananas for each monkey?
Five clever monkeys split 125 bananas they carried back. How many bananas for each one?
Four monkeys hauled 100 bananas back to their tree. How many bananas does each monkey receive?
Eighteen energetic monkeys divided 360 bananas equally. How many bananas does each monkey munch on?
Twenty monkeys came across a jackpot of 500 bananas! How many bananas for each monkey?
